summary.span: Enthält Klassen, die die Interoperation von Steuerelementen in Windows Forms und WPF unterstützen.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die -Namespace enthält Klassen, die Interoperation zwischen ermöglichen die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] und [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Technologien.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Bei Verwendung von Klassen, die Sie hosten [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] Steuerelemente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Seiten und [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Elemente im [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-basierenden Anwendungen.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Zwei wichtigsten Klassen, die interoperation Funktionen zu implementieren sind und .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . Die verwendete Klasse hängt von der Implementierung des Steuerelements ab:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Verwenden der Klasse bei der Verwendung muss ein [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control für eine [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Seite.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Verwenden der Klasse bei der Verwendung muss ein [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Element in einer [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]--basierten Anwendung.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
